pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with members of the Committee on Ways and Means | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with members of the House of Representatives Committee on Ways and Means.

The Prime Minister and members of the Committee discussed the North American Free Trade Agreement and the mutual economic benefit trade brings to all partners.

Canada is the largest single export market for the United States and bilateral trade in goods and services between the two countries has doubled under the North American Free Trade Agreement.
